product_name: Sony Sony Action Cam Float Mount
long_description: Use the high-visibility Sony Action Cam float mount with the Action Cam waterproof case (sold separately) to help ensure your wearable camcorder stays afloat if you accidentally drop it in the water. Bright yellow body color helps you spot your camera, even in murky water or low light.
short_description: Use the high-visibility Sony Action Cam float mount with the Action Cam waterproof case (sold separately) to help ensure your wearable camcorder stays afloat if you accidentally drop it in the water.
